attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
3X is a newly established extreme sports group focused on getting a Skate park within the Lisburn City Center area that all can use with great accessibility.

Petition below is a collaborated petition with the efforts of the Youth worker in the Lisburn YMCA and the 3X Forum Group. The idea is to get the support of as many people as possible, especially adults, (18 plus), to help us in our youth led project looking at establishing a skate park within the Lisburn Area. Your help, time and support are very gratefully appreciated
